title: Amy’s Free Throw Challenge + Morgan2 Opens Up About Last Relationship For the First Time + Bobby’s Mailbag: Buying Someone An X-Mas Gift After 2 Months of Dating
itunes:title: Amy’s Free Throw Challenge + Morgan2 Opens Up About Last Relationship For the First Time + Bobby’s Mailbag: Buying Someone An X-Mas Gift After 2 Months of Dating
description:
Amy goes out to the basketball court to try and make 6 out of 10 free throws after claiming she was an all-time free thrower. Morgan2 compares her most listened to songs of last year vs this year after her breakup. She talks for the first time about how she caught him cheating. Bobby opens up the mailbag from a listener who wants to know if she should buy the guy a gift she's been dating for two months.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
